      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com es diu: bones tardes o bona tarda?</string>
            <string language="en">Singular or plural when saying "Good afternoon" in Catalan?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einzigartig oder Plural, wenn "guter Nachmittag" 
auf katalanisch gesagt wird?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Singulier ou pluriel en disant le "bon 
après-midi" dans le catalan ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Singular ou plural ao dizer "a tarde boa" no 
catalan?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Singolare o plurale quando dicono "buon 
pomeriggio" nel catalan?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενικός αριθμός ή πληθυντικός κατά το ρητό του 
"καλού απογεύματοσ" στα καταλανικά;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre la manera d'expressar el temps en les fórmules de cortesia en català.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on grammatical number when bidding someone "Good afternoon" in Catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua catalana</string>
            <string language="en">Catalan language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua catalana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">morfologia</string>
            <string language="en">morphology (linguistics)</string>
            <string language="es">morfología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fonologia</string>
            <string language="en">phonology</string>
            <string language="es">fonología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Espanya</string>
            <string language="en">Spain</string>
            <string language="es">España</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frage und Antwort (GLEICHHEIT) auf grammatischer Zahl, 
wenn jemand "guter Nachmittag" auf katalanisch geboten wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Question et réponse (PAIR) sur le nombre grammatical en 
offrant quelqu'un "bon après-midi" dans le catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pergunta e resposta (PAR) no número gramatical ao 
oferecer alguém "tarde boa" no catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risposta (PAR) sul numero grammaticale quando 
fanno un'offerta qualcuno "pomeriggio buon" nel catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στο γραμματικό αριθμό κατά 
τον προσφορά σε κάποιο του "καλού απογεύματοσ" στα καταλανικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalanische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
